Class CoreSettlementBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Business Service class presenting core operations for Settlement.

    • Method Detail

      • findActiveConnectionGroupsWithConnections

        public Map<ConnectionGroup,Set<Connection>> findActiveConnectionGroupsWithConnections(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                                                      org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Finds the active connection groups and their connections.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of validity.
        endDate - {LocalDate end date of validity (inclusive).
        Returns:
        a Map with the connection group as key (ConnectionGroup) and a List of Connection as value.

      • findRelevantPrognoses

        public List<PtuPrognosis> findRelevantPrognoses(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Finds the prognoses relevant for the settlement. Prognoses with a period within the two given dates and with status ACCEPTED, FINAL and ARCHIVED will be returned.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        Returns:
        a List of PtuPrognosis.

      • findRelevantFlexRequests

        public List<PtuFlexRequest> findRelevantFlexRequests(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                     org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Finds all flex requests candidate to settlement process (period of the flex request within the interval defined by the two given dates and status ACCEPTED).
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the settlement (inclusive).
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the settlement (inclusive).
        Returns:
        a List of PtuFlexRequest.

      • findRelevantFlexOffers

        public List<PtuFlexOffer> findRelevantFlexOffers(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                 org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Finds all accepted flex offers for the period defined by the two given dates.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        Returns:
        a List of PtuFlexOffer.

      • findRelevantFlexOrders

        public List<PtuFlexOrder> findRelevantFlexOrders(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                 org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate)
        Finds all acknowledged flex orders for the period defined by the two given dates.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the settlement period (inclusive).
        Returns:
        a List of PtuFlexOrder.

      • createFlexOrderSettlements

        public void createFlexOrderSettlements(List<FlexOrderSettlementDto> flexOrderSettlementDtos)
        Stores Flex Order Settlement items in the database.
        Parameters:
        flexOrderSettlementDtos - a List of FlexOrderSettlementDto items, which will be transformed to FlexOrderSettlement entities.

      • isEachFlexOrderReadyForSettlement

        public Boolean isEachFlexOrderReadyForSettlement(Integer year,
                                                 Integer month)
        Checks if each accepted flex order in the given month of the given year has a related settlement item in the database.
        Parameters:
        year - Integer year.
        month - Integer month.
        Returns:
        true if each ACCEPTED flex order planboard message has a related FlexOrderSettlement entity; false otherwise.

      • findFlexOrderSettlementsForPeriod

        public List<FlexOrderSettlement> findFlexOrderSettlementsForPeriod(org.joda.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                                   org.joda.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                                                   Optional<String> connectionGroup,
                                                                   Optional<String> participantDomain)
        Finds the Flex Order Settlement entities for the given period.
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the period (inclusive).
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the period (inclusive).
        connectionGroup - Optional USEF identifier of the connection group of the flex order settlement.
        participantDomain - Optional participant domain of the flex order settlement.
        Returns:
        a List of FlexOrderSettlement entities.
